buildCommand: bash -c 'if ! command -v flutter &> /dev/null; then curl -L https://storage.googleapis.com/flutter_infra_release/releases/stable/linux/flutter_linux_3.6.0-stable.tar.xz | tar xJ -C /tmp && export PATH="$PATH:/tmp/flutter/bin"; fi && cd .. && echo "SUPABASE_URL=$SUPABASE_URL" > clinic/web/.env && echo "SUPABASE_ANON_KEY=$SUPABASE_ANON_KEY" >> clinic/web/.env && echo "GEMINI_API_KEY=$GEMINI_API_KEY" >> clinic/web/.env && flutter pub get && flutter build web --release --web-renderer canvaskit --base-href /'
